solution_line_template: Colton gave away {stickers_per_friend} stickers * {num_friends} friends = <<{stickers_per_friend}*{num_friends}={stickers_given_to_three_friends}>>{stickers_given_to_three_friends} stickers.

In total, Colton gave away {stickers_given_to_three_friends} + {stickers_given_to_mandy} + {stickers_given_to_justin} stickers = <<{stickers_given_to_three_friends}+{stickers_given_to_mandy}+{stickers_given_to_justin}={total_stickers_given_away}>>{total_stickers_given_away} stickers.

Colton's number of total stickers at the end is {initial_stickers} - {total_stickers_given_away} = <<{initial_stickers}-{total_stickers_given_away}={remaining_stickers}>>{remaining_stickers} stickers.
